adjective.definition: Belonging or relating to a particular area or neighborhood, typically exclusively so.
Affecting only a particular part of the body.

noun.definition: An inhabitant of a particular area or neighborhood.
A pub convenient to a person's home (British informal).

verb.example: The infection was localized in the knee.
They localized the software for the Japanese market.

usage_examples: We try to buy local produce.
She is a well-known local artist.
